snippet: The billionaire Warren E. Buffett’s company said its second-quarter profit soared 41 percent on a significant investment gain from a stock-swap deal completed earlier this year.
abstract: Berkshire Hathaway reports second-quarter profits up 41 percent on significant investment gain from stock-swap deal; net income grew to $6.4 billion, up from $4.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire Warren E. Buffett’s company said its second-quarter profit soared 41 percent on a significant investment gain from a stock-swap deal completed earlier this year.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway’s Profit Surges on Stock Swap
headline.print_headline: Berkshire Hathaway’s Profit Surges on Stock Swap
